subject: Rodeos
lead_paragraph: Southern Arkansas University has received a $2 million donation from a Magnolia, Ark., couple, Therral and Jan Story, that will help it build a $3.5 million rodeo arena.
snippet: Southern Arkansas University has received a $2 million donation from a Magnolia, Ark., couple, Therral and Jan Story, that will help it build a $3.5 million rodeo arena.
